name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 18, someone posted a leaflet saying "Boycott Meituan's Self-pickup Cabinet" on the Meituan takeaway cabinet in Yinhu Science and Technology Park, Fuyang, Hangzhou.
It is reported that Meituan has recently started to charge riders for takeaway cabinets.
The article stated that Meituan's net profit in the third quarter of 2024 was 12.9 billion yuan, which is enough to subsidize the self-pickup cabinet business, and riders should not pay for it.
"A better life depends not only on personal efforts, but also on collective strength to fight against seemingly unbreakable injustice." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkFROx9XwAA7E8J.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 18 (released), Qingdao, Shandong. Chen Shijiang, chairman of Qingdao Ailijie Company, was framed and accused of murder and imprisoned for eight years. Chen Shijiang said he was tortured and induced to confess: "If you don't admit it, you will be beaten until you admit it, until you have hallucinations, and you will not be given food." "They didn't write down anything I said to prove my innocence. I said I wanted to hire a lawyer and was beaten." Chen Shijiang said he hoped the case could be solved quickly. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891887623591043072/pu/img/lO9TCRsLo3LO2O69.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师

Do you want to see your wife and children? As long as you memorize the transcript, you can go home today. You don't have to care what is written in the transcript." The lawyer said: "Everyone in the comment area, will you sign or not?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891890491131822085/pu/img/61bXMhkWmZaOM2Ex.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 18, it was reported that Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan began to formulate plans on the 17th to deal with possible "incidents in Taiwan."
The plan aims to evacuate about 120,000 residents from the Sakishima Islands in Okinawa Prefecture, mainly including Ishigaki Island and Miyako Island, and relocate them to eight prefectures in Kyushu and Yamaguchi Prefecture. Among them, Fukuoka Prefecture plans to receive about 47,000 people and resettle them in seven cities including Fukuoka City and Kitakyushu City.
In addition, residents of Miyako Island will first fly to Kagoshima Airport and then go to the evacuation site by bus or rail. Omuta City, Iizuka City, Tagawa City, Asakura City, etc. are also included in the acceptance plan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 13, a 19-year-old boy said that last year, when his father was working at a sand field in Kunming, the owner of the sand field, Chen, neglected it, and the heavy objects that should have been fixed fell down and hit his father's head, causing his death.
Afterwards, the government was asked to mediate, but Chen never cooperated. Even after the final lawsuit, Chen still refused to compensate, and even drove a luxury car and lived in a luxury house. We victims have always lived in the haze, and we beg the relevant departments to handle this matter and give us justice. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891893745337196544/pu/img/8RJuKJLU3x_5bZei.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 18, US President Trump severely criticized Ukrainian President Zelensky.
Trump criticized Zelensky's leadership, calling him a bad negotiator and "extremely incompetent"
He said Zelensky should have ended this three years ago and should not have started this, and Zelensky could have reached a ceasefire agreement. Trump hinted that if Ukraine wants a seat at the negotiating table, new elections should be held
He also said that the current situation is that Ukraine has not held elections yet, and the Ukrainian leader's approval rating has dropped to 4%.

It is said that in order to fight back against Shandong home fans who raised photos of Chun Doo-hwan in the match against Gwangju (in 1980, Chun Doo-hwan ordered the use of force to suppress the Gwangju Movement, causing the death and injury of a large number of civilians and students), today's Korean fans prepared a large number of 64 pictures to fight back on the spot, and Shandong Taishan directly gave up the game. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkIxKqAXwAIyaXF.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: [The accused resident accused the case officers of hanging him up and shocking him] On July 7, 2022, Bao Jiye and his sons Bao Shaorui, Bao Qinrui and 10 others were taken away from their homes by the police. They were identified as participating in beating migrant workers and loan sharking, and the case was named the "5.25" case. Bao Qinrui and 9 other people in the same case were all placed under residential surveillance at a designated location. Thirteen days later, 34-year-old Bao Qinrui died. The indictment of the procuratorate alleges that from July 7 to July 19, 2022, Zhang Xuguang, Xing Zichao, Wang Ziqian, Wu Weitao and 8 others used torture to obtain the suspect's confession of guilt during the investigation of the "5.25" case. Bao Shaorui recalled that in the yard, he was put in a small iron cage and hung up, with his toes barely touching the ground. Some case officers poured water on his head, and then used a hand-cranked telephone to shock his genitals and waist. Except for the first defendant Zhang Xuguang, the other seven defendants were all born in the 1990s.
fullContent:
【被指居者控诉被办案人员吊起来电击】2022年7月7日，暴继业和儿子暴韶瑞、暴钦瑞等10人，分别被警察从家中带走，他们被认定为参与殴打民工、放高利贷等，此案被命名为“5.25”专案。
 暴钦瑞和同案9人，均被执行指定居所监视居住，13天后，34岁的暴钦瑞死亡。检查院起诉书中指控，2022年7月7日-7月19日，张旭光、邢子超、王子谦、吴玮涛等8人查办“5.25”专案期间，为获取嫌疑人的有罪供述时采取的刑讯逼供手段。
 暴韶瑞回忆，在院子里，他被放进一个小铁笼里吊起来，脚尖几乎挨不着地，有办案人员往他头上浇水，然后用手摇电话机电击他的生殖器、腰部。
除第一被告张旭光外，其余7名被告人都是90后，当中还有两人是00后，邢子超称，第一遍讯问时，被指居者不好好说，张旭光就扇耳光。到第二遍，就让马帅上工具，最开始用pvc管打手心脚心。后来暴钦瑞和暴韶瑞很不配合，主要针对他两用过好几次手摇电话机，还用过皮带、电棍。
 邢子超称：“我们其实都不愿意做，都是从学校出来的，如果不这样做，张旭光可能会评价这个人不适合干这行之类的”张旭光说过，“不敢下手就当不了好警察，警察不会动手就是窝囊”
 暴钦瑞死亡当晚，销毁正据、建立“攻守同盟”的行动就开始了，多名被告在庭审时承认事发后试图建立“攻守同盟”张旭光则当庭翻供，称对此自己没说过，也没听到过。
 2025年2月13日，保定当地法院对新乐公安8名涉案人员涉嫌故意伤害、刑讯逼供罪进行公开审理，被控刑讯逼供者在不同程度上对侦察阶段供述的刑讯逼供行为翻供。

content: On February 15, blogger "Huisi" found that the price of traditional Chinese medicine included in the medical insurance is much higher than the market price. The most expensive one catty is more than 3,000 yuan. For example, "Stir-fried jujube kernel formula granules" is 6.3049 yuan/gram, which is more expensive than silver. On the online shopping platform, a Beijing Tongrentang jujube kernel powder raw material costs 26 yuan per can. "Angelica dahurica formula granules" is 0.5582 yuan/gram, but on the shopping app, you can buy 500 grams for 22 yuan. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkJad_MaYAATfkU.jpg

content:
U.S. and Russian officials held talks in the Arab capital of Riyadh on the 18th. Zelensky made it clear: As the President of Ukraine, I will not accept any ultimatum from Russia.
Ukrainian President Zelensky expressed strong opposition to the talks: "The impression given is that the United States and Russia are discussing Russia's ultimatum, and the negotiations are taking place between Russia and the United States, but without Ukraine. Ukraine did not succumb to these ultimatums at the most difficult times, so why should it accept it now?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Democratic Party, the first political party in Hong Kong, has been suppressed in recent years. Some pro-establishment media reported that this old party is planning to dissolve. In response, the party chairman Luo Jianxi only confirmed that the Central Committee will be convened tomorrow to discuss the party's future direction. As for whether it will include dissolution, he only said that there is no limit to the discussion. If there is any decision, it will be carried out in accordance with the party constitution, that is, it must be voted by the general meeting of members.
Since opposing the amendment of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance in 2019, the Democratic Party has been targeted by the government and establishment forces. The refusal of Hong Kong government officials to meet is one example. It is difficult to get the nomination of the establishment when running for election. Since the Beijing government reformed the Hong Kong electoral system to ensure the implementation of "patriots governing Hong Kong", it has not participated in elections and cannot find a venue for organizing activities.

Zelensky responded at a press conference in Kiev on Wednesday, saying, "We have seen this false information. We know that this information comes from Russia." He said that Trump "lives in this false information space." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkJ6jvcWcAABdqQ.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 19. Elephant News: Uncle Lin, 74, suffers from right lung adenocarcinoma, and the tumor has developed to stage IV. Xiamen Traditional Chinese Medicine Hospital has prepared a Chinese medicine decoction for him. After treatment, a CT scan six months later found that the primary tumor in the right lung had completely disappeared.
Dr. Wang Rui from Chongqing Thoracic Surgery: A patient was found to have a nodule in the right upper lung, but he was unwilling to undergo surgery and insisted on being discharged from the hospital to take Chinese medicine. Three months later, it developed into stage IV cancer and there is no chance of surgery for the time being. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkKBjJCXIAA1DUZ.jpg
